title: Anonymous Part 3: A BDSM Anthology
description: BBB Presents Anonymous Part 3: A BDSM AnthologyAnonymous - lacking recognizability There are certain groups where being anonymous is truly coveted. Those wishing to fulfill their deepest desires through sex games and kink without the burden of names and faces.Join this group of anonymous authors as they take you into the dark underground world of BDSM, some of which you may recognize and some will surprise you. This is a multi-author anthology that comes with Trigger warnings and the stories may end on a cliffhanger.
author: Lenore Danvers
